title: Trauma Healing with Aromatherapy and Meditation: How to use Aromatherapy and Meditation to Heal
description: Soothe your skin, psyche, and more with easy aromatherapy and oil treatments made from pure plant extractsIf you have suffered from a serious trauma in your life that affects your mind and body, these solutions can help you support your brain and body as you heal the past and create a healthier mind-body for greater happiness in the present and the future.
author: Tracy Phillips
